name: tm42
effect: Teaches Facade to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Facade to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II & I: Dream Eater)

flavor_text.black-white: An attack move that doubles its power if the user is poisoned, paralyzed, or has a burn.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: An attack move that doubles its power if the user is poisoned, paralyzed, or has a burn.
